name: Crypto's UX Problem: from Solana to SEC Regulated
description: Describing our move from Solana ecosystem to being a regulated firm in Chicago. Commentary on Crypto's UX issues and why we found most people won't use crypto in its current state.

speakers.name: Sage Farrenholz
speakers.bio: I'm Co-Founder, CEO of Coherence. I believe that crypto needs to focus more on accessibility and interoperability with "Web2" systems. We must make worthwhile tradeoffs between crypto's strengths and openness to newcomers and traditional institutions.
